humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates the presence of a 1.5 cm tumor (lesion at 3 o'clock) and a 2.2 cm tumor (lesion at 6 o'clock). The T stage is determined by the size of the largest tumor, which in this case is the 2.2 cm tumor. Therefore, the T stage is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates the presence of a 1.5 cm tumor (T2 stage) in the 3 o'clock location and a 2.2 cm tumor (T2 stage) in the 6 o'clock portion, separated by at least 1.5 cm of benign breast tissue. The T stage is determined by the size of the largest tumor, so the T2 stage is appropriate based on the size of the larger tumor.
